mapper.select: select c.* from (select * from chatting where chatting_roomNo = #{chatting_roomNo}) c where rownum <= 10 order by chatting_no
select c.*, to_char(chatting_time, 'yy/mm/dd') chatting_date from (select * from chatting where chatting_roomNo = #{chatting_roomNo}) c order by chatting_no
mapper.update: update bulpan set bulpan_readcnt = bulpan_readcnt + 1 where bulpan_no = #{bulpan_no}
mapper.insert: insert into chatting (chatting_no, chatting_writer, chatting_content, chatting_roomNo, chatting_id, chatting_nickName) values( (select nvl(max(chatting_no), 0) from chatting where chatting_roomNo = #{chatting_roomNo}) + 1, #{chatting_writer}, #{chatting_content}, #{chatting_roomNo}, #{chatting_id}, #{chatting_nickName} )
mapper.select: select n.* from (select n.*, rownum bulpan_rownum from (select * from bulpan where bulpan_header = #{header} order by bulpan_no) n order by bulpan_rownum desc) n where bulpan_rownum between #{beginList} and #{endList}
select count(*) from bulpan where bulpan_header = #{header}
